hero.title: We Build Websites That Sell
hero.subtitle: We specialize in Next.js, WordPress, WooCommerce, PrestaShop, and web applications built on Spring Boot. We transform your ideas into working digital solutions.

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: We are a team of technology enthusiasts who have been creating modern web solutions for companies across Poland and Europe since 2020.
about.mission: Our mission is to deliver high-quality websites and applications that not only look great but, most importantly, bring real business results.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We treat each project individually. We care about the smallest details to deliver the highest quality product.

timeliness.title: Timeliness
timeliness.description: We respect your time. We deliver projects according to the agreed schedule, without delays.

support.title: Support
support.description: We don't end cooperation after deployment. We offer full technical support and help in developing your project.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We keep you updated at every stage of the project. You know exactly what's happening and what you're paying for.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer comprehensive web solutions tailored to your needs

support.title: Support
support.description: Full technical support and help in project development.

technologies.title: Technologies We Use
technologies.subtitle: The most modern tools and frameworks

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to questions you ask us most often

duration.question: How long does project delivery take?
duration.answer: Delivery time depends on project complexity. A simple business card website takes 2-3 weeks, more advanced e-commerce takes 6-12 weeks.

cost.question: How much does a website cost?
cost.answer: Prices are individual and depend on project scope. Simple business card websites start from $1,200, advanced online stores from $3,500.

hosting.question: Do you offer hosting?
hosting.answer: Yes, we can handle your website hosting. We work with the best hosting providers in Poland and abroad.

cms.question: Can I edit the website myself?
cms.answer: Of course! All our projects come with intuitive admin panels. Additionally, we provide training on how to use them.

changes.question: What if I need changes after deployment?
changes.answer: We offer technical support packages and the ability to commission further changes and extensions.

responsive.question: Do you create responsive websites?
responsive.answer: Yes, all our websites are fully responsive and adapted to mobile devices, tablets and desktops.

cta.title: Ready for a New Project?
cta.description: Contact us today and get a free quote and consultation. Let's talk about your project and find the best solution.

metadata.title: IT Solutions - Professional Web Development
metadata.description: We create modern websites and web applications. Next.js, WordPress, WooCommerce, PrestaShop. Over 150 completed projects.
metadata.keywords: web development, web applications, Next.js, WordPress, WooCommerce, PrestaShop, software development
